actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to periodically report to the Congress on the status, condition, and productive potential of privately owned forest land.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Agriculture, on the date the Congress first assembles in 1980 and on the date Congress first assembles in each fifth year thereafter, to transmit to the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate a report concerning the status and condition of privately owned forest land, productivity of such land, and methods of increasing such productivity.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to periodically report to the Congress on the status, condition, and productive potential of privately owned forest land.
